page.title: 05SPORT ON CLEE HILL IN 1985
page.content:
The most popular game is{ {football.}There are 3 different age groups__under 12's, under 15's and the men's team. In the finals, the under 12's lost to Cleobury Mortimer, and the under 15's beat Ludlow Town and won the Caynham Charity Shield. The under 12's and under 15's play on the recreation ground, which is in Clee Hill.The men's team play on the Knowle football pitch.
In our area, there are 5{domino} teams. The Craven Arms Inn came top of the Tenbury League.{Pool}is also played and the Victoria Inn came top of the Cleobury League. A{quoits} League has just started this year. There are several men and women's teams who play{darts.}This year a ladies'{rounders}team has just been formed.
